text: Dimaadua e helekai, “Nia daangada o Edom gu haihai nadau huaidu e logowaahee, gei Au ga hagaduadua digaula. Digaula gu daaligi nadau duaahina1.11 Nia daangada o Edom la di hagadili ni Esau, dela go duaahina daane o Jacob, dela go tamana madua o digau Israel  o Israel gi nnulumanu dauwa, ge deai di nadau dumaalia gi digaula ai. E dadaahi hua beelaa nadau hagawelewele, dono haga odi ai.
